description.value:
You choose a guild and gain the benefit of the Guild Attacks class feature, except that you choose only two of the at-will attack powers associated with your guild.

@UUID[Compendium.dnd-4e-compendium.module-features.lxrdumnUcALGXpj5]{League of Whispers (Hybrid)}@UUID[Compendium.dnd-4e-compendium.module-powers.6asx4D7ClBKJMrPt]{Bola Takedown}@UUID[Compendium.dnd-4e-compendium.module-powers.85yS2fv4KJoMzik3]{Precision Dart}@UUID[Compendium.dnd-4e-compendium.module-powers.WrFJEAt4k3PsYOoj]{Quick Shot}@UUID[Compendium.dnd-4e-compendium.module-features.Wt2c3xNy0u7plkMX]{Red Scales (Hybrid)}@UUID[Compendium.dnd-4e-compendium.module-powers.Cy4glf0TJazOQNoI]{Garrote Strangle}@UUID[Compendium.dnd-4e-compendium.module-powers.WOSBuzo9NcmrKewp]{Poisoned Dagger}@UUID[Compendium.dnd-4e-compendium.module-powers.RSvzITDQmUhFc37d]{Quick Lunge}

Published in Dragon Magazine 400.
